scripts.clean: lerna exec --stream -- git clean -f -d -X && git clean -f -d -X
scripts.clean:pnpm: lerna exec --stream -- rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm clean
scripts.ncu:minor: ncu -t minor -u && lerna exec --stream -- ncu -t minor -u -x unbuild
scripts.ncu:patch: ncu -t patch -u && lerna exec --stream -- ncu -t patch -u -x unbuild
scripts.prepare: rimraf .husky && husky install && husky add .husky/commit-msg "npx commitlint --edit $1"
scripts.update: pnpm ncu:minor && pnpm ncu:major && pnpm ncu:patch
